channel.title: Client not working
channel.description:
i've downloaded the phonescape client and the new cache files which is on the 2nd or 3rd page. when i got to phonescape client and click compile it compiles without errors then when i press start "start phonescape.bat" it sais a message saying " exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: EGUI"
i have the cache already which is the one that was already in the phonescape client and i was woundering of someone could help me out trying to fix this problem and also telling me a tut or a tut link on how to put in the new cache thanks peace ;D

item.title: Client not working
item.dc:creator: @undeadscape_owner undeadscape owner
item.description:
@undeadscape_owner wrote:

heres a step by step: i unzip it, i open phonescape client, i compile it, i click run phonescape, as cmd window comes up thats sais Type 1 to start eyrescape gui
Type 2 to read readme
i type in 1 and that message comes up " exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: EGUI"

Read full topic
